channel.title: [Basic] How to change Npc Locations
channel.description:
Ok, in this tutorial i will be explaining how to change Npc's Locations. I've seen a lot of question about this so i thought i would make a simple easy quick guide.
[b]Step 1 [/b] - Open your Autospawn.config. This is were all Npc's cords will be located.
Autospawn should look something like this. [code]spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1 spawn = 2263 3017 4816 0 3021 4820 2975 4812 1 spawn = 2263 3020 4813 0 3024 4817 2978 4809 1 spawn = 2265 3018 4811 0 3022 4815 2976 4807 1 spawn = 2263 3030 4810 0 3034 4814 2988 4806 1 spawn = 2263 3034 4810 0 3038 4814 2992 4806 1 spawn = 2263 3045 4810 0 3049 4814 3003 4806 1 spawn = 2263 3056 4813 0 3060 4817 3014 4809 1 spawn = 2265 3062 4823 0 3066 4827 3020 4819 1 spawn = 2264 3063 4825 0 3067 4829 3021 4821 1 spawn = 2263 3063 4831 0 3067 4835 3021 4827 1 spawn = 2263 3062 4837 0 3066 4841 3020 4833 1 spawn = 2263 3061 4838 0 3065 4842 3019 4834 1 spawn = 2264 3060 4843 0 3064 4847 3018 4839 1 spawn = 2263 3055 4850 0 3059 4854 3013 4846 1 spawn = 2263 3050 4852 0 3054 4856 3008 4848 1 spawn = 2263 3053 4853 0 3057 4857 3011 4849 1 spawn = 2263 3042 4854 0 3046 4858 3000 4850 1[/code]
[b]Step 2[/b]- You always want to make sure your have the correct Npc ID, or cordinates of the Npc you want to change.
[b]Tip[/b] - An easy way to find the Npc's cord is go in-game, find the npc you want to change, stand over it, and type "::mypos'" If you dont have a "Mypos" command find the Npc's ID, you should have an Npc ID list somewhere in you server files, if not Download the Npc ID list below.
[size=12pt][b]Npc ID list download[/b][/size] - http://uppit.com/v/MR51F9Z4
[b]Note[/b] - I may not have some of you Npc's if not you going to have to find them yourself.
[b]Step 3[/b] - Once you have the correct ID, or Cords, or botch Search them in you Autospawn.Config.
[b]Expample[/b] - [i]Control F to search[/i] (2263 3021). [i]Once you have found the cord, change it to the new cordinate you want it to be.[/i]
Make sure everything is lined up perfect, and you have made no errors, Once you finished compile. Your Npc should be at the new location you set to.
You can also delete or add new Npc's in Autospawn. You can also replace without having errors. [code]spawn = 2263 3032 4853 0 3036 4857 2990 4849 1 spawn = 2264 3029 4853 0 3033 4857 2987 4849 1 spawn = Change to new cords 4847 0 3025 4851 2979 4843 1 spawn = 2263 3018 4841 0 3022 4845 2976 4837 1 spawn = 2263 3017 4839 0 3021 4843 2975 4835 1[/code]

item.title: [Basic] How to change Npc Locations
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

Ok, in this tutorial i will be explaining how to change Npc’s Locations. I’ve seen a lot of question about this so i thought i would make a simple easy quick guide.

Step 1 - Open your Autospawn.config. This is were all Npc’s cords will be located.

Autospawn should look something like this.

spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1 spawn = 2263 3017 4816 0 3021 4820 2975 4812 1 spawn = 2263 3020 4813 0 3024 4817 2978 4809 1 spawn = 2265 3018 4811 0 3022 4815 2976 4807 1 spawn = 2263 3030 4810 0 3034 4814 2988 4806 1 spawn = 2263 3034 4810 0 3038 4814 2992 4806 1 spawn = 2263 3045 4810 0 3049 4814 3003 4806 1 spawn = 2263 3056 4813 0 3060 4817 3014 4809 1 spawn = 2265 3062 4823 0 3066 4827 3020 4819 1 spawn = 2264 3063 4825 0 3067 4829 3021 4821 1 spawn = 2263 3063 4831 0 3067 4835 3021 4827 1 spawn = 2263 3062 4837 0 3066 4841 3020 4833 1 spawn = 2263 3061 4838 0 3065 4842 3019 4834 1 spawn = 2264 3060 4843 0 3064 4847 3018 4839 1 spawn = 2263 3055 4850 0 3059 4854 3013 4846 1 spawn = 2263 3050 4852 0 3054 4856 3008 4848 1 spawn = 2263 3053 4853 0 3057 4857 3011 4849 1 spawn = 2263 3042 4854 0 3046 4858 3000 4850 1

Step 2- You always want to make sure your have the correct Npc ID, or cordinates of the Npc you want to change.

Tip - An easy way to find the Npc’s cord is go in-game, find the npc you want to change, stand over it, and type “::mypos’” If you dont have a “Mypos” command find the Npc’s ID, you should have an Npc ID list somewhere in you server files, if not Download the Npc ID list below.

[size=12pt]Npc ID list download[/size] - http://uppit.com/v/MR51F9Z4

Note - I may not have some of you Npc’s if not you going to have to find them yourself.

Step 3 - Once you have the correct ID, or Cords, or botch Search them in you Autospawn.Config.

Expample - Control F to search (2263 3021).
Once you have found the cord, change it to the new cordinate you want it to be.

Make sure everything is lined up perfect, and you have made no errors, Once you finished compile. Your Npc should be at the new location you set to.

You can also delete or add new Npc’s in Autospawn. You can also replace without having errors.

spawn = 2263 3032 4853 0 3036 4857 2990 4849 1 spawn = 2264 3029 4853 0 3033 4857 2987 4849 1 spawn = Change to new cords 4847 0 3025 4851 2979 4843 1 spawn = 2263 3018 4841 0 3022 4845 2976 4837 1 spawn = 2263 3017 4839 0 3021 4843 2975 4835 1

Read full topic
